Just as Philip K. Dick’s acclaimed science-fiction shows his gift for dystopian fantasy, so too his early efforts at mainstream novels (i) _________ his ability to represent the more (ii) ________ world.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) attest to
(D) ebullient
(B) belie
(E) quotidian
(C)  gainsay
(F) fantastical
